author: Staff Reporter
text:
Total hundial collection of Sri Dhandayuthapaniswamy temple for the past 14 days was Rs.2,72,44,253 in cash, according to HR&CE Joint Commissioner P. Rajamanickam here on Tuesday

Besides, 730 grams of gold, 20,900 grams of silver and 708 foreign currency notes in various denominations were the other collections in the hundial.

Volunteers

More than 280 volunteers including students, temple staff and bank employees participated in the counting process, he added.
title: Hundial collection
